text: The Vice-President of Sierra Leone is the second most senior government official in the executive branch of the Republic of Sierra Leone government after the president. The vice president only constitutional power is to replace the president of Sierra Leone if the president resigned or is removed from office by the Sierra Leone parliament. Other than that the power of the vice president depends on the role delegated to the office by the president. ==Other websites== *Vice Presidential office of the President of Sierra Leone
title: Vice-President of Sierra Leone
